channel.title: Hi guys
channel.description: Hi guys I came across this community when googling discussion forums. I'm 15 and I'm a huge xbox fan. Uhm, I just got a new iPod touch today. So I'm browsing on it! Here are Some screen shots of website on ipod [i]this also now my goodbye thread peace out[/i] [img]http://I44.tinypic.com/2nv6u03.Png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2q80x6s.png[/img]

item.title: Hi guys
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:

[quote=“King Redrum, post:40, topic:253032”]Jme, I’m not going to fight with you because I have no problems with you.

I can handle being called an ass-kisser, that’s not the problem, not at all, it’s the fact that this forum is being overrun by idiots who think that because they can call people ass-kissers and e-bully, they feel like they are gods, that is what bothers me.[/quote]
Then do like jme, and suck it up and shut up.

item.title: Hi guys
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:42, topic:253032”][quote author=King Redrum link=topic=334238.msg2603711#msg2603711 date=1230412550]
Jme, I’m not going to fight with you because I have no problems with you.

I can handle being called an ass-kisser, that’s not the problem, not at all, it’s the fact that this forum is being overrun by idiots who think that because they can call people ass-kissers and e-bully, they feel like they are gods, that is what bothers me.
[/quote]
If you can handle being called an “ass-kisser” , then how come you replied like 2 or 3times?
You shouldn’t worry about it too much, there are a lot of ass-kissers around.
You should try joining the asskissers community : www.ikissass.com
or if you want to stop : www.quitkissass.com
Don’t worry, people like you DO have a future, like you could work in a place where the boss likes his ass to be kissed.[/quote]

I’ll pass on both websites and seeing as you’re about as arrogant as myself, I’ll be the bigger man out of the both of us and end it. Now run along.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi guys
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:31, topic:253032”][quote author=King Redrum link=topic=334238.msg2603458#msg2603458 date=1230399488]

From readig MANY topics I have. Noticed that you have a bunch of community problems. Let alone a ton of ‘assholes’, saying this as nice as possible.

It’s how we like it, baby.
[/quote]I’m a Christian… But I’m not going to debate about it. And at least you like it.

Congratulations on bringing up your religion. Do you honestly think i give a flying fuck about what nonsense you believe? Thanks for presenting something completely off-topic.

I too don’t give a damn what nonsense anyone wants to believe.

Tree, I think I’m beginning to like you. o_O Scary.

No, I think you like sucking up to the higher authority.

hahah agreed

Hahah, this is why I don’t speak with people who have an IQ below a rock.

Make one comment and they flock to you trying to insult you so that they look like they have an IQ, when in all reality, they’re nothing but idiots.

If your response was pointed at me, i really dont care why you dont speak with people who have an IQ below a rock.
I’m just saying, dont start kissing other people’s ass.[/quote]

Wasn’t trying to kiss ass, this is what I call kissing ass:

“Oh my god Tree = super g0dly mod who beat all teh other modz cause he is the best one and shit” < Now that is kissing ass. Simply saying that I’m beginning to like someone doesn’t mean I’m kissing their ass, it means out of the hundreds of people on MITB, I finally notice someone who in turn makes a good laugh or anything of that sort.

the bank:

King Redrum is simply wanting to suck Tree’s balls.

Please don’t confuse me with yourself.

and @Snow, stick around man, once you learn who the jackasses and the ‘decent people’ are, it’s actually a pretty good forum, it’s also addicting in a sense.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi guys
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I don’t think the community has grown to tolerate “the stupidity of pwnd” but rather pwnd has grown to tolerate the stupidity of this community. I’m using pwnd to respresent a lot of us. Most of us who have been here pre-mitb.com, were completely different people back then. The community was better, there was no reason to act stupid.

I’m trying hard not to look for trouble anymore. Instead of being the first to call someone an idiot, I just dont reply anymore. I recently re-read the black book of rs cheating word for word and realized a few things which I can’t describe. But it definitely sparked nostalgia. I have no interest in cheating but I think everyone could benefit reading it again. I’ll upload version 5 later.

There’s inspiration in that book. It’s filled with spelling and grammar errors, and a lot is just cows point of view.

Cow kindly allowed me to add this chapter to his black book. So, what's going on? As many of you know, I have already left IRC, I haven't worked on SCAR for a long time and now I only reside in AutoRune channel. My purpose in this cheating community from the very beginning was to educate the cheaters. To get out of their heads that stupid ideology they have had for too long time: Download, run, hope it's not a trojan. From the very beginning my cheats were different. All cheats before AutoRune were simple (alas Nick's autominer) - you launched them and pressed the button - it was running. My cheats required scripting which is a step to programming. Now many of the cheaters can script and program, they can remove rotating map from mudclient and create justclient without my help, there are several very good JAVA programmers... I am not necessary for this community to exist. In fact there are several sub communities - SCARers, ITers, RBers and ARers. My leaving won't even affect 3 of those (not even SCARers since SCAR source code has been published). I could not decide if I should say this or not. I will. The main reason why I leave is, I'm different than you. Why am I cheating? It's an intellectual challenge for me. I am not doing it for money or skills, no. That's why many people could not understand how can it not feel bad getting my character banned (99 mining, 86 smithing, 60 mill GPs). I have seen you lie. I have seen you scam. I have seen you fight. I don't like it. I hoped you would change. I still do. However I wish RuneScape cheating a long life. Remember guys, you used to be like those n00bs that join our channels and ask for cheats to be sent to their e-mail. Look at yourself now. Look at how clever you have become, how much you know, how much you can tell and do. You are the best when you want to. And you are the best. You are member of the most powerful RuneScape cheating community ever. Always remember that!

Kaitnieks

How is that not inspiration to do better here. The whole book is rs cheating rising, falling, rising, falling, etc. And even if you remember reading the book or you lived through it yourself, read it again.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi guys
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

@Pwnd: I'm surprised that so many of the users here still see you as someone of any importance at all, let alone someone who leaves footsteps that are worth following. If we tossed your arrogant self into a completely different community that hadn't grown to tolerate your stupidity then you'd be fed to the sharks by its userbase.
This forum made me what I am. I'm helpful on forums that have some actual value to them.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi guys
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Lethal snow:

this also now my goodbye thread peace out

Aw c’mon. Stay for a bit.

New members are treated rough sometimes, kind of like initiation. Stay for a while and make some good first impressions. You’ll see this is possibly the most addictive community there is.

I would also avoid IRC for a while.

item.title: Hi guys
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

You’ve had the best possible welcome to mitb. Welcome! This is just the way the forum is. It’s the only reason many of us come on here, to enjoy the flame wars. Although you might have been offended, its best to ward off of this topic and go check out someone else getting owned!
